text:
Hi Community,
Could someone help me clarify the following? Having an issue passing the "hutk"  when submitting a form to HubSpot. The information in the "hutk" is not sent to HubSpot.

The only way we saw was to add the form in a hidden DIV or something to try to fetch the hutk identifier. Unfortunately, the resulting cookie did not contain the value (and this is a rather nasty way of course).
How can we fetch the Hutk? (Or is there a script we can include for ONLY the tracking cookie so that weâ€™re able to fetch the Hutk identifier).

Any insight is appreciated...
I am facing the same issue.
